CGFE
NIGHT LETTER
8-13-53
Several places still available in TV Management Seminar
roster, August 30-September 5 at Ames, Iowa, and a few still available
for TV Production Workshop at University of Illinois, August 28-Septembar
18* Do not find (City or State) represented* Am checking to see if
you would still like to recommend someone* If so please contact me
by August 17* Delaying closing entries until that time®
Harry J* Skoraia
Executive Director
Nat*!* Assn* Ed* 3d*
